casebody.data:
George T. Newhall, Respondent, v. William H. Appleton, et al., Appellants. Decided March 14, 1887. Appeal by defendant from the judgment entered upon report of a referee. Edward W. Paige, for appellant. William W. Badger, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and Dugro, JJ.

Opinion by Dugro, J.

Judgment affirmed, With costs.
